mn87:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn87:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa gahapatissa ekaputtako piyo manāpo kālaṅkato hoti.
mn87:2.2: Tassa kālaṃkiriyāya neva kammantā paṭibhanti na bhattaṃ paṭibhāti.
mn87:3.1: Atha kho so gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho taṃ gahapatiṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
mn87:3.2: “na kho te, gahapati, sake citte ṭhitassa indriyāni, atthi te indriyānaṃ aññathattan”ti.
mn87:3.4: mayhañhi, bhante, ekaputto piyo manāpo kālaṅkato.
mn87:3.5: Tassa kālaṃkiriyāya neva kammantā paṭibhanti, na bhattaṃ paṭibhāti.
mn87:3.12: Piyajātikā hi kho, bhante, ānandasomanassā piyappabhavikā”ti.
mn87:3.13: Atha kho so gahapati bhagavato bhāsitaṃ anabhinanditvā paṭikkositvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
mn87:4.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā akkhadhuttā bhagavato avidūre akkhehi dibbanti.
mn87:4.2: Atha kho so gahapati yena te akkhadhuttā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā akkhadhutte etadavoca:
mn87:4.3: “idhāhaṃ, bhonto, yena samaṇo gotamo tenupasaṅkamiṃ; upasaṅkamitvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃ. Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho maṃ, bhonto, samaṇo gotamo etadavoca:
mn87:4.4: ‘na kho te, gahapati, sake citte ṭhitassa indriyāni, atthi te indriyānaṃ aññathattan’ti.
mn87:4.5: Evaṃ vutte, ahaṃ, bhonto, samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ etadavocaṃ:
mn87:4.7: mayhañhi, bhante, ekaputtako piyo manāpo kālaṅkato.
mn87:4.8: Tassa kālaṅkiriyāya neva kammantā paṭibhanti, na bhattaṃ paṭibhāti.
mn87:4.15: Piyajātikā hi kho, bhante, ānandasomanassā piyappabhavikā’ti.
mn87:4.16: Atha khvāhaṃ, bhonto, samaṇassa gotamassa bhāsitaṃ anabhinanditvā paṭikkositvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamin”ti.
mn87:4.19: Atha kho so gahapati “sameti me akkhadhuttehī”ti pakkāmi.
mn87:5.1: Atha kho idaṃ kathāvatthu anupubbena rājantepuraṃ pāvisi.
mn87:5.2: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo mallikaṃ deviṃ āmantesi:
mn87:5.6: “Evameva panāyaṃ mallikā yaññadeva samaṇo gotamo bhāsati taṃ tadevassa abbhanumodati:
mn87:5.8: Seyyathāpi nāma, yaññadeva ācariyo antevāsissa bhāsati taṃ tadevassa antevāsī abbhanumodati:
mn87:5.10: Evameva kho tvaṃ, mallike, yaññadeva samaṇo gotamo bhāsati taṃ tadevassa abbhanumodasi:
mn87:6.1: Atha kho mallikā devī nāḷijaṅghaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ āmantesi:
mn87:6.2: “ehi tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkama; upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandāhi, appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ puccha:
mn87:6.3: ‘mallikā, bhante, devī bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati, appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ pucchatī’ti;
mn87:6.5: ‘bhāsitā nu kho, bhante, bhagavatā esā vācā—
mn87:6.7: Yathā te bhagavā byākaroti taṃ sādhukaṃ uggahetvā mama āroceyyāsi.
mn87:6.9: “Evaṃ, bhotī”ti kho nāḷijaṅgho brāhmaṇo mallikāya deviyā paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi.
mn87:6.10: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho nāḷijaṅgho brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn87:6.11: “mallikā, bho gotama, devī bhoto gotamassa pāde sirasā vandati; appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ pucchati;
mn87:6.13: ‘bhāsitā nu kho, bhante, bhagavatā esā vācā—
mn87:8.1: Tadamināpetaṃ, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikā.
mn87:8.2: Bhūtapubbaṃ, brāhmaṇa, imissāyeva sāvatthiyā aññatarissā itthiyā mātā kālamakāsi.
mn87:8.3: Sā tassā kālakiriyāya ummattikā khittacittā rathikāya rathikaṃ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha:
mn87:8.4: ‘api me mātaraṃ addassatha, api me mātaraṃ addassathā’ti?
mn87:9-14.1: Imināpi kho etaṃ, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikāti.
mn87:9-14.2: Bhūtapubbaṃ, brāhmaṇa, imissāyeva sāvatthiyā aññatarissā itthiyā pitā kālamakāsi …
mn87:9-14.8: Sā tassa kālakiriyāya ummattikā khittacittā rathikāya rathikaṃ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha:
mn87:9-14.9: ‘api me sāmikaṃ addassatha, api me sāmikaṃ addassathā’ti?
mn87:15-21.1: Imināpi kho etaṃ, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikāti.
mn87:15-21.2: Bhūtapubbaṃ, brāhmaṇa, imissāyeva sāvatthiyā aññatarassa purisassa mātā kālamakāsi.
mn87:15-21.3: So tassā kālakiriyāya ummattako khittacitto rathikāya rathikaṃ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha:
mn87:15-21.4: ‘api me mātaraṃ addassatha, api me mātaraṃ addassathā’ti?
mn87:15-21.5: Imināpi kho etaṃ, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikāti.
mn87:15-21.6: Bhūtapubbaṃ, brāhmaṇa, imissāyeva sāvatthiyā aññatarassa purisassa pitā kālamakāsi …
mn87:15-21.12: So tassā kālakiriyāya ummattako khittacitto rathikāya rathikaṃ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha:
mn87:15-21.13: ‘api me pajāpatiṃ addassatha, api me pajāpatiṃ addassathā’ti?
mn87:15-21.14: Imināpi kho etaṃ, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikāti.
mn87:22.1: Bhūtapubbaṃ, brāhmaṇa, imissāyeva sāvatthiyā aññatarā itthī ñātikulaṃ agamāsi.
mn87:22.2: Tassā te ñātakā sāmikaṃ acchinditvā aññassa dātukāmā.
mn87:22.4: Atha kho sā itthī sāmikaṃ etadavoca:
mn87:22.5: ‘ime, maṃ, ayyaputta, ñātakā tvaṃ acchinditvā aññassa dātukāmā.
mn87:22.7: Atha kho so puriso taṃ itthiṃ dvidhā chetvā attānaṃ upphālesi:
mn87:22.9: Imināpi kho etaṃ, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikā”ti.
mn87:23.1: Atha kho nāḷijaṅgho brāhmaṇo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena mallikā devī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā yāvatako ahosi bhagavatā saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo taṃ sabbaṃ mallikāya deviyā ārocesi. Atha kho mallikā devī yena rājā pasenadi kosalo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā rājānaṃ pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ etadavoca:
mn87:24.5: vajiriyā te kumāriyā vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
mn87:24.6: “Vajiriyā me, mallike, kumāriyā vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā jīvitassapi siyā aññathattaṃ, kiṃ pana me na uppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
mn87:24.7: “Idaṃ kho taṃ, mahārāja, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sandhāya bhāsitaṃ:
mn87:25.4: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mahārāja, vāsabhāya te khattiyāya vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
mn87:25.5: “Vāsabhāya me, mallike, khattiyāya vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā jīvitassapi siyā aññathattaṃ, kiṃ pana me na uppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
mn87:25.6: “Idaṃ kho taṃ, mahārāja, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sandhāya bhāsitaṃ:
mn87:26.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mahārāja, piyo te viṭaṭūbho senāpatī”ti?
mn87:26.3: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mahārāja, viṭaṭūbhassa te senāpatissa vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
mn87:26.4: “Viṭaṭūbhassa me, mallike, senāpatissa vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā jīvitassapi siyā aññathattaṃ, kiṃ pana me na uppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
mn87:26.5: “Idaṃ kho taṃ, mahārāja, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sandhāya bhāsitaṃ:
mn87:27.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mahārāja, piyā te ahan”ti?
mn87:27.5: “Tuyhañhi me, mallike, vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā jīvitassapi siyā aññathattaṃ, kiṃ pana me na uppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
mn87:27.6: “Idaṃ kho taṃ, mahārāja, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sandhāya bhāsitaṃ:
mn87:28.4: Kāsikosalānaṃ, mallike, ānubhāvena kāsikacandanaṃ paccanubhoma, mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhāremā”ti.
mn87:28.7: “Kāsikosalānañhi, mallike, vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā jīvitassapi siyā aññathattaṃ, kiṃ pana me na uppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
mn87:28.8: “Idaṃ kho taṃ, mahārāja, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sandhāya bhāsitaṃ:
mn87:29.2: Yāvañca so bhagavā paññāya ativijjha maññe passati.
mn87:29.4: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā tikkhattuṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
